entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as taking a bow and holding Harry up after he fainted.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned as asking Ron what he was after.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is experiencing a terrible pain in his lightning scar.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as asking Harry if he's all right and offering him a seat.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned alongside Ron in the scene where they're trying to help Harry.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's scream of fury is heard by Harry and he discovers that Voldemort has just discovered the loss of one of his Horcruxes.

entities.name: room of requirement
entities.description: The Room of Requirement is where Harry stands after being pulled out of Voldemort's mind.

relationships.description: Harry feels Voldemort's scream of fury and realizes that Voldemort has just discovered the loss of one of his Horcruxes.
Ron is holding Harry up after he fainted.
Neville is concerned about Harry's well-being and offers him a seat.
